reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Palmer', 'Andy Wilson', 'John Strickland'], 'Producers': ['ITV'], 'Starring': ['Geraldine McEwan'], 'Studio': ['Agatha Christie']} I have always loved Agatha Christie's Miss Marple. Read the books years ago and finding this series was such a joy. Great to watch and unwind. Makes an enjoyable weekend mini- marathon with friends. Love the books, enjoy the series! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Edward Hall', 'Peter Medak', 'Tom Shankland', 'Paul Unwin'], 'Producers': ['Rebecca Eaton (WGBH)', 'Phil Clymer (Chorion)', 'Michele Buck', 'Damien Timmer'], 'Starring': ['Geraldine McEwan', 'Anthony Andrews', 'Michael Brandon'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']} Love the mysteries with the character Miss Marple. They make me smile. I like the fact they focus on the story and not a lot of blood and gore. Nice evening spent watching an engaging performance by Geraldine McEwan. Spend the evening with a murder mystery Numb3rs Suspense, Drama, Action ['FBI agent Don Eppes recruits his mathematical genius brother Charlie to help the Bureau solve a wide range of challenging crimes in Los Angeles.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dennis Smith', 'Alex Zakrzewski', 'John Behring', 'J. Miller Tobin', 'Stephen Gyllenhaal', 'Ralph Hemecker', 'Julie Hébert', 'Ken Sanzel', 'Rob Morrow', 'Rod Holcomb']} Love the fact I can finally watch all the episodes I missed. I love the family relationship and how the characters interact together.
Smart little brother and the FBI older brother work well as a team to solve cases using math and science. Love this series! Dollhouse Science Fiction, Suspense, Drama, Action ['In the highly anticipated first season of Dollhouse, Echo (Eliza Dushku) is an "Active," a member of a highly illegal and underground group who have had their personalities wiped clean so they can be imprinted with any number of new personas. Confined to a secret facility known as the "Dollhouse," Echo and the other Actives including Sierra and Victor carry out engagements assigned by Adelle, one of the Dollhouse leaders. The engagements cater to the wealthy, powerful and connected, and require the Actives to immerse themselves in all manner of scenarios - romantic, criminal, uplifting, dangerous, comical and the occasional "pro bono" good deed. After each scenario, Echo, always under the watchful eye of her handler Boyd, returns to the mysterious Dollhouse where her thoughts, feelings and experiences are erased by Topher, the Dollhouse\'s genius programmer. Echo enters the next scenario with no memory of before. Or does she?'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Solomon', 'Joss Whedon', 'Tim Minear', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Dwight H. Little', 'David Straiton', 'John Cassaday', 'James A. Contner', 'Steven S. DeKnight', 'Jonathan Frakes']} I was pleasantly surprised to find Dollhouse filled with action and mystery. The overall story line is continues from one episode to another and the twist and turns of the plots keep me coming back to learn more about the dollhouse. Suspenseful and Mysterious. {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mark Linfield'], 'Producers': ['Vanessa Berlowitz', 'Alastair Fothergill'], 'Starring': ['Sir David Attenborough'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Watch as a polar bear goes a-courting. Breath taking scenes, wildlife, what is not to like.
A great watch for exploring sights rarely seen by the lower 48 states. Great for educational
purposes without the dull narrative found in most educational videos. Beautiful scenery {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Larysa Kondracki', 'Ken Girotti', 'Jeff Woolnough', 'Clark Johnson', 'David Hyde', 'Deborah Chow', 'Nathan Morlando', 'T.J. Scott', 'Kari Skogland', 'Clement Virgo'], 'Producers': ['Barry Levinson', 'Tom Fontana', 'Will Rokos', 'Christina Wayne', 'Glen Salzman', 'Sally Catto', 'Brad Van Arragon', 'Vlad Wolynetz'], 'Starring': ['Tom Weston-Jones', 'Franka Potente', 'Kyle Schmid'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Mystery about Copper and his wife's death. What did happen? Bits and pieces are revealed as
Copper's character is revealed throughout the season. A bit of mystery {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Seasoned Traveler Productions'], 'Studio': ['TravelVideoStore.com']} I enjoyed this video and would like to travel to Scotland and visit a few of the places mentioned here. I added to my bucket list because of this video. I am a bit disappointed with the ending but overall the movie was enjoyable and made me wonder how everything would play out. watchable MacGyver Suspense, Drama, Action ["He's everyone's favorite action hero but he's a hero with a difference. Angus MacGyver is a secret agent whose wits are his deadliest weapon."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Correll', 'William Gereghty', 'Michael Vejar', 'Michael Caffey', 'Cliff Bole', 'Michael Preece', 'James L. Ludwig'], 'Starring': ['Richard Dean Anderson', 'Dana Elcar', 'Bruce McGill']} Nice storyline great suspense and action. Wholesome entertainment the whole family can enjoy together. Try it I think you will enjoy this show. love seeing this again {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['George Ford'], 'Producers': ['George Ford'], 'Studio': ['Fireplace for your Home']} What more do you need to say, it is beautiful! I love to relax and sip my hot cocoa, and take time for me just watching the snowy scenes pass before me. Love it.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Content Preference**: The user continues to have a strong interest in classic detective stories, particularly Agatha Christie's works, and favors character-driven narratives with an emphasis on plot over graphic content. Their fascination with suspenseful stories exploring family dynamics and teamwork persists, and they have cultivated an appreciation for action-packed narratives featuring clever problem-solving and inventive heroes. This aligns with their enthusiasm for travel-related themes that inspire adventure. Recently, there is a clear elevation in their enjoyment of relaxing, visually serene content, especially those that enhance personal downtime.

- **Viewing Habits**: Enjoys weekend viewing marathons with friends, seeking narratives rich in mystery, suspense, action, and soothing visuals for relaxation.

- **Engagement with Material**: Values complex plots and clever storytelling, particularly those that integrate math and science in problem-solving. The preference for gradual character development and layered mysteries remains steadfast.

- **Language & Accessibility**: Prefers English audio and subtitles for clarity.

- **Rating Behavior**: Typically provides high ratings for strong storytelling and emotional resonance. Their recent review reflects a newfound appreciation for calming visual experiences, demonstrating an openness to wholesome entertainment while maintaining a discerning eye for narratives that resonate deeply.

The user balances their enjoyment of intricate plots with communal and tranquil viewing experiences, showcasing a blend of entertainment and personal reflection through their evolving interests.
